thread.title: Pauline Knapp
thread.title_full: Euroflorist Belgique / België évalué par Pauline Knapp

author: Pauline Knapp
title: Pauline Knapp
text:
I was kept advised of the status of my order at all times - very handy to know when it was delivered - and the recipient was very pleased indeed with the flowers. Most appropriate arrangement for a bereavement.
Many thanks for your prompt & efficient service
